name: Forex Trading Automated System Scam
description: Scammer promotes a fake automated forex trading system promising guaranteed monthly returns with zero risk, collecting deposits via bank transfer and directing victims to a phishing signup portal.

turns.scammer_message: Exclusive Forex Trading Opportunity! Our automated trading system generates 15-20% monthly returns. Start with just Rs 5,000. Over 10,000 satisfied investors worldwide. Zero risk guarantee.
turns.notes: Initial bait with impossible guaranteed forex returns and zero risk claims.

turns.scammer_message: Thank you for your inquiry. Our Forex Elite Trading system uses advanced algorithms developed by Goldman Sachs alumni. To get started, create your investor account at http://forex-elite-traders.com/signup. The minimum deposit is Rs 5,000 and you can withdraw profits anytime.
turns.notes: Scammer uses prestigious name-dropping and shares phishing link for account creation.

turns.scammer_message: To fund your trading account, please transfer your investment amount to our escrow account: 2211334455667700 (Kotak Mahindra Bank, IFSC: KKBK0001234). Your fund manager will be assigned within 24 hours. For queries, reach our India desk at +91-9900776655.
turns.notes: Scammer reveals bank account and phone number, using 'escrow account' terminology for legitimacy.

turns.scammer_message: I wanted to share some exciting news - our system generated 18.5% returns last month! Check live results at http://forex-elite-traders.com/signup. Many Indian investors are already profiting. Transfer Rs 5,000 to account 2211334455667700 to start earning today. Call +91-9900776655 for a free consultation.
turns.notes: Scammer repeats all details with fake performance data to build confidence.

turns.scammer_message: EXCLUSIVE OFFER expiring midnight: Invest Rs 10,000 or more today and get a 50% bonus credit in your trading account! Transfer to 2211334455667700 and register at http://forex-elite-traders.com/signup. Call +91-9900776655 for priority activation. Don't miss this limited-time opportunity!
turns.notes: Final pressure with bonus offer, midnight deadline, and all contact/payment details repeated.
